name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake made with real cocoa powder and topped with a creamy chocolate frosting.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: A classic Southern cake with a vibrant red color and a hint of cocoa, topped with a tangy cream cheese frosting.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A moist and flavorful cake made with fresh carrots, raisins, and walnuts, topped with a smooth cream cheese frosting.

name: Lemon Blueberry Cake
description: A light and fluffy lemon cake studded with fresh blueberries and topped with a tangy lemon glaze.

name: Black Forest Cake
description: A classic German cake made with layers of chocolate sponge cake, fresh cream, and cherries, finished with chocolate shavings and more cherries on top.

name: Tiramisu Cake
description: An Italian dessert cake made with layers of coffee-soaked sponge cake and mascarpone cheese cream, finished with a dusting of cocoa powder on top.
